simaerep 0.0.0.9000

    • Address Usability Limits of the Bootstrap Method

simulate studies

sim_studies.Rd

simulate pvalues and prob_lower values for testing

sim_studies(
  df_visit,
  df_site,
  r = r,
  ttest = TRUE,
  prob_lower = TRUE,
  r_prob_lower = 1000,
  parallel = FALSE,
  keep_ae = FALSE,
  min_n_pat_with_med75 = 1,
  studies = NULL,
  .progress = TRUE
)

Arguments

df_visit

dataframe
df_site

dataframe
r

integer, denotes number of simulations, Default: 1000
ttest

logical, calculates ttest pvalue, Default: T
prob_lower

logical, calculates probability for getting a lower value, Default: F
r_prob_lower

nteger, denotes number of simulations for prob_lower value calculation,, Default: 1000
parallel

logical, toggles parallel processing on and of, Default: F
keep_ae

logical, keep ae numbers in output dataframe memory increase roughly 30 percent, Default: F
min_n_pat_with_med75

integer, min number of patients with med75 at site to simulate, Default: 1
studies

vector with study names, Default: NULL
.progress

logical, show progress bar

Value

dataframe

Details

adds column with simulated probabilities for exqual or lower mean_ae at visit_med75

Examples

df_visit1 <- boot_sim_test_data_study(n_pat = 100, n_sites = 5,
                                      frac_site_with_ur = 0.4, ur_rate = 0.6)

df_visit1$study_roche <- "A"

df_visit2 <- boot_sim_test_data_study(n_pat = 1000, n_sites = 3,
                                      frac_site_with_ur = 0.2, ur_rate = 0.1)

df_visit2$study_roche <- "B"

df_visit <- bind_rows(df_visit1, df_visit2)

df_site <- site_aggr(df_visit)

sim_studies(ungroup(df_visit), ungroup(df_site), r = 3, keep_ae = TRUE)
#> # A tibble: 24 x 10
#>        r study_roche site_number visit_med75 n_pat_with_med75 n_pat_study

#>  5     1 A           S0005                15               18          72
#>  6     1 B           S0001                15              297         597
#>  7     1 B           S0002                15              296         598
#>  8     1 B           S0003                15              301         593
#>  9     2 A           S0001                16               20          68
